scripts.start: start both api and ui bundeled !
scripts.start:api:dev: set API_PORT=5000 && yarn workspace rpi-car-api start:dev
scripts.start:api:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set API_PORT=5001 && yarn workspace rpi-car-api start:dev
scripts.start:ui: yarn workspace yarn workspace rpi-car-ui react-scripts start
scripts.build: yarn workspace yarn workspace rpi-car-ui react-scripts build
scripts.test: yarn workspace yarn workspace rpi-car-ui react-scripts test
